#summary Release Guide for DKPro TC

=Release to Maven Central=

Please follow the [http://code.google.com/p/dkpro-core-asl/wiki/ReleaseGuide DKPro Core Release Guide]. 

Exceptions are as follows:

   * during branching/releasing, the formatting of the headers in the POMs might change, which will make the mycila license header plugin check fail. To avoid this, deactivate the check during the release.
